## `R` masks the numerical errors

by printing a \emph{convenient} summary of objects
```{r float1}
7/13
print(7/13, digits=16)
```

\pause

So do not use binary operator to compare floats because
```{r float2}
.1 == .3/3
print(.3/3, digits=16)
```

\pause

Try
```{r float3}
all.equal(.1, .3/3)
```
